entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliSense surfacing unrelated extension methods #68720
  • Public API changes for InlineArrays feature #68719
  • CS8618 Gives a misleading or confusing message #68716
  • Assert when using `__arglist` and `in` arguments together #68714
  • Bad performance from CoreWF - no fast way to create a LambdaExpression from VB script code #68712
  • Consider caching `Locations` instead of allocating a new array each time it's accessed #68710
  • EnC: changing parameter suppresses method body analysis #68708

Closed

  • Edit → Format document replaces tabs with spaces when `indent_style = tab` #68709

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish additional package and TFM for razor testing #68725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Log perf telemetry for LSP completion handler #68724
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't expose MS.VS.LanguageServer.Protocol types from EA.Razor #68713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix SuppressMessage attributes working on primary constructors #68706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce number of iterations for LongInitializers test #68723
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report exceptions thrown in callbacks in Workspace.SetCurrentSolutionAsync #68722
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Fix variable capture analysis in presense of parameter changes #68699
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into InlineArrays #68717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move ref readonly parameter tests to one file #68711
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Ensure VisualStudioOptionPersister is only created once #68701
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations for LocalScopeBinder.BuildLocals #68684
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Validate diagnostics reported by source generators #68635
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Collection literals: type inference #68703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • target and crossgen servicehub binaries for .NET 8 #68698
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Compiler.Next
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
